name: Techomag
tag_list: techomag, blog, tech, news, facebook, security, tips, tricks, blogging, seo, internet-marketing
overview:
Techomag is a technical blog , started by a group of tech geeks from south India during April 2010. Techomag was first started out for fun as a medium to share knowledge with people and later on late 2011 it was made a tech blogging company with 5 workers writing and sharing their knowledge with the world.

Techomag intend to provide the reader’s with the latest news on various gadgets ,websites, movies , softwares ,make money online , wordpress , windows , linux and much more.

Apart from providing Articles for its readers techomag has also started up some other new projects such as Coverbooth which was launched on late december , 2011. Coverbooth is a Facebook cover featuring gallery with over thousand stunning facebook cover designs.

Techomag is currently working on another new project Pepalo , which is expected to be released this summer. Pepalo is a social network to filter out facebook status updates of friends and show only relevant status provided by the user. This will keep the users safe from facebook spamy links. This new social network will be mainly for college students who are banned to use facebook and other social networks in their college or hostels. With this feature any users can access pepalo and facebook even if they are banned to directly access the site , this is done through our special gateway.
